about_the_game:
In the world of Chimera: Bloodlines, you step into the shoes of Archer, the most formidable Chimera to have ever existed. A living paradox, Archer possesses a reputation as a highly functioning alcoholic, fueling his extraordinary abilities while dancing on the edge of reason.



Within the dystopian metropolis of Versai, you assume the pivotal role of a Special Exterminator for the Inquisition. As the relentless hunter of Chimeras, supernatural humans birthed from forbidden unions between bloodlines, the fate of this posthumanist society lies in your hands. Every move you make, every choice you embrace, shall carve the path that shapes the destiny of all. Prepare to embark on a treacherous journey, where power, rebellion, and sex intertwine.



Non-linear choice-driven adult game. Discover the intricate web of consequences that arise from your choices as you navigate through a dark and provocative dystopian society. Unleash the full extent of your powers as you explore the complex dynamics between Chimeras and humans, engage in thought-provoking conversations, and intimate encounters.

Pure love or lust-filled harem. Choose to find pure love and treasure the one who means the most to you, or create a lust-filled harem where pleasure knows no bounds. Develop meaningful relationships or take shortcuts to fulfill your desires. Will you pursue a connection of the flesh or that of the heart?

ChimeraPad: management and date-simulation system. Utilize the innovative ChimeraPad system during your free time, strategically allocating limited action points to shape your relationships with women and influence the trajectory of the story. Indulge in your primal cravings or embark on a path of compassion, forging deep and meaningful connections.

Replayability and freedom. Experience the thrill of multiple distinct playthroughs, offering paths of redemption, corruption, or anarchy. Form alliances that shape the very fabric of this world or ignite the flames of war against any faction that dares challenge your will. Immerse yourself in the conflict between the Inquisition's pursuit of order, freedom, and chaos.

The demarcation between passion and power, morality and lust, love and sex, all crumble into oblivion. Within this realm, only power speaks, whispering its seductive promises into your ears...

content_descriptors.notes: Depending on the selected playthrough, the sexual content will vary from the fictional vanilla to more violent & forced variations. Specifically, depending on your decisions, the scenes might include depictions of coerced sex, abuse of alcohol, influencing someone's state of mind for personal gain, murder, or self-harm (referring to both the acts of inflicting physical damage upon the character's own body or suicide caused by indirect or direct influences). The game contains action scenes with graphic violence but does not include gore elements such as visible blood, lacerations, or bleeding wounds at any playthrough. Depending on the ways of interrogation, the game may include BDSM or submission-focused events. Note that the game can be played on the Redemption pathway that wouldn't include any sexual content considered violent or coerced.
